item.title: Katex support
item.description: The following $$ \int_{a}^{b} x^2 dx $$ Is an integral $$ \varphi = 1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\frac{1} {1+\cdots} } } $$ Enable Katex in the config file by setting the katex param to true. This will import the necessary Katex CSS/JS. See the online reference of supported TeX functions.
